General.Name: Mandom Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk manufactures and trades in cosmetics for men and women in Indonesia. It offers hair care products, including hair vitamin and hair color products; and skin care, body care, and makeup products, as well as sprays, deodorants, fragrances, cleansing materials, and plastic containers. The company markets its products under the JOHNNY ANDREAN, TANCHO, FRESH N FRESH, LUCIDO-L, PIXY, PUCELLE, MIRATONE, LOVILLEA, GATSBY, MANDOM, COLOR COMM, SPALDING, GLAZELLE de Pucelle, and STYLE UP brands. Its sells its products in the United Arab Emirates, Malaysia, Japan, Thailand, the Philippines, India, Singapore, Korea, Vietnam, China, Hongkong, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as PT Tancho Indonesia and changed its name to PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk in 2001. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Mandom Corporation.
